website_summaries.verdict: This drill packs a lot of power for a battery-powered unit, and it comes at a very budget-friendly price.
pros: Well balanced and easy to use
Holds a charge for a long time
An affordable solution for tackling most household tasks
cons: This drill doesn't come with variable speed control
It may not be powerful enough for the toughest tasks

customer_reviews.title: MAKES CLEANING A BREEZE.
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS TO USE WITH THE ROTOSCRUB BATHROOM CLEANING DRILL... LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph LaValle

customer_reviews.title: No USB charging
customer_reviews.text: The drill I received does not have USB charging. On the Black and Decker website, the same model number brings up the one with USB charging which leads me to believe this might just be an older version, but that's not what's pictured and not what I ordered. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tillie

customer_reviews.title: It fits him quite well and is a good addition to the little tool set I bought for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 yr old son to use when I need 'help' around the house. It fits him quite well and is a good addition to the little tool set I bought for him. He is very excited to start working on practicing his drilling skills on the old pallets we have out back. I also bought a scrubber attachment for the drill so he can use his drill to scrub the bathroom. Not to toot my own horn, but I really am brilliant. :D
customer_reviews.author: Katherine HudgensTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price, but cannot regulate speed
customer_reviews.text: Single speed only. When using it with screwdriver bit, it is awkward to avoid stripping helical threads running around it. Its excellent price may mean "I got what I paid for."
customer_reviews.author: AFA_Prof

customer_reviews.title: Great item. No usb charge port.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this all around my home since i got it. For lightweight to middleweight duty. No drilling only screwing and used as a cleaner brush. It works perfectly with no issues. Ill be using it for light drilling duty on my project guitars as it should be no problem at all. Charge/battery life is somewhat short but usable for mpst projects around the house. As for chatge cable it didnt come with a usb type plug it came with a regular adapter you see on othet rechargeable tools... Not a deal breaker but sold as usb and would have been more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to figure out....
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could have been clearer. I wrote an initial bad review and ended up calling Black and Decker customer service just to figure out 30 mins later that you have to lock the bit into lace by spinning the drill. I legit thought I was missing a piece 🤦🏾‍♀️ .... seems like it’ll be fine for house hold things. Getting ready to use for curtains. .... Better Directions!
customer_reviews.author: A Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good things do come in small packages.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I only needed a cordless drill for small projects around the house. Did not want to pay for a heavy duty drill that would not be used all that often. This little drill is perfect. Small, lightweight and yet very powerful. Charges quickly from the included charger, or you can use any other 5 volt USB charger you already may have. I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGuy

customer_reviews.title: No USB charging
customer_reviews.text: The drill I received does not have USB charging. Drill came with wall charger and proprietary round connector. There is no USB connection as shown in the image on the Black and Decker and Amazon websites. It`s a fake?
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: USB Recharging!
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I bought this was the Micro USB Charging port. It being orange was a very nice secondary bonus. I ordered one but it did not use Micro USB as the description and images show. it uses some proprietary connection not even a barrel plug but some dumb special one of a kind 2 pin special proprietary connection. the polar opposite of what made me want the other one. Non Proprietary. not happy. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good for Lite Tasks
customer_reviews.text: This is good enough for lite household use but pooped out after drilling one hole in a 2x4. We got it so that if we lose power, we can still fasten wing nuts to put up shutters and it should serve that purpose. The big boys are too heavy for me so I like this drill and recommend it for jobs that don't require a lot of oomph. I also like that it can be charged via usb cable in our car's port.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate listing - Not USB Chargeable
customer_reviews.text: The listing picture and description clearly shows/says that it is USB chargeable, with a mini-USB port on the back for charging it. What arrived does not have a USB port. It has a round charging socket that will only work with the included AC charger. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: JumpinJackFlash

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: After two and a half years of light use, the motor will no longer hold a charge. The work time after a charge started getting shorter and shorter a couple of weeks ago. I finally resorted to letting it charge overnight, for a total of less than five minutes of work. It quit on me in the middle of a bunch of DIY home repair projects, so I am really NOT pleased!
customer_reviews.author: mysticwolf

customer_reviews.title: It is not USB charged as pictured.  Otherwise nice.
customer_reviews.text: Not USB charged as pictured ! It is the standard round Black and Decker 110v plug in. If you are buying this bc it is USB - DO NOT buy. Awesome little drill otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: DWTJAX

customer_reviews.title: Product that shipped was not as described
customer_reviews.text: Product that shipped was not as described and I went through return process only to receive the exact same item. This is not a USB chargeable cordless drill as shown in the photos or described in the description. Do not buy if this is what you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.author: jason revell

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful enough for most household uses
customer_reviews.text: I've lived long enough to know to never expect more from a product than its price would warrant. If you're mounting framed pictures, installing lightweight hardware in your patio or plan to pre-drill for most household substrate installations, this is a great product. I think it's perfectly priced for what it does. If you have something really specific in mind for a project that requires more power, I would recommend that you visit a trusted retail establishment for expert advice.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Wellborn

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I’m not very handy but this little device is awesome. I can use a screw driver all day but it’s racing on the hands and fingers. This save me so much time and I get more accomplished. Granted it took me a few minutes to understand the thing, only because I’m not handy. I did buy extra bits but the one it came with works just fine. So at this moment it’s a good buy and I’d recommend it to anyone who doesn’t like the big bulky ones. It’s quite petite for a woman’s hand. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I don't use a drill very often, but when I need one I need one. The battery had gone bad on my old drill (not a B&D) and buying a new battery would've cost more than this drill. I've been a B&D fan for more than thirty-five years, so I didn't have any hesitation about whether this one would be good enough. I've only used it once, but I was quite pleased with the light weight. It was as powerful as I needed it to be. So I'm looking forward to using this during those periodic times when I need it. Honestly, I expect this drill to outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Great product black & decker
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it help me make a class project. Lot of detail work to do, it kept a long charge.
customer_reviews.author: joyaliaa

customer_reviews.title: battery powerless
customer_reviews.text: No power. I could use it as a skin exfoliating brush. In fact, I will. My original intention was to use this cordless w/ those cleaning brushes designed for a drill. My tub scum laughed at me and said "that tickles". No power. None.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a usb rechargeable port.
customer_reviews.text: It is not usb rechargeable. I bought this drill specifically because of the us b reachable claim so I can recharge it at my remote camper and on the road, but you get is some 110v power supply and specialty power plug that looks fairly fragile and won't be replaceble when it breaks or is lost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight with Long battery BUT VERY WEAK!
customer_reviews.text: This drill is well a drill that gets the job done BUT be aware that the power isn't that strong. I wish I had gotten a proper 20W or something that has power behind it when drilling. I like it again, It's wireless and I use it here and there for small projects but again wherever you need to drill in holes or if you need to screw in a big nail and the surface is hard and you need power behind the nail pushing it in...this won't help there. It's ideal for people who need it for very minimal forced drilling or else definitely spend 10 more bucks and get the higher voltage one.
customer_reviews.author: Rana Masood

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the driver in. It's a waste of money. Sending back
customer_reviews.author: EAS

customer_reviews.title: Great drill but slow to charge.
customer_reviews.text: I got it but was disappointed in the fact that it needed 8 hours to charge. I finally got to use it and put a 7/8 spades bit on it. I made 10 holes in plastic barrels and put a lot of weight on it. It slowed down some and heated up but it did do it. It still had battery life left but I chose to charge it again so it's ready for the next time. It's been charging 3 hours and i don't know how long it will take to recover from 10 holes. I love how light weight it is and truly is perfect for small jobs and home tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Future A.

customer_reviews.title: Please with Performance & Price
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I am a beginner with fixing anything around the house. So, I use the drill for small, infrequent projects around the house. I researched for several months before I decided on this drill. And, I am very pleased. The instructions are informative on how to use and/or attach accessories. The drill is light, compact and east to handle/maneuver. Even though the drill is light, it is powerful but not overwhelming. I feel in control of the drill when in use. Overall, I am pleased with both the price and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Fee Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good for small fixes
customer_reviews.text: You won't be undertaking any big projects with this little drill, but it'll work just fine for installing shelves or drilling through sheetrock. I would even trust this drill with drilling pilot holes through soft wood. The battery life is excellent and it is easy to charge. The speed is slow and not adjustable. If you aren't planning to use this drill for big projects, but need something for quick fixes around the home, this is the drill for you!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Not micro USB
customer_reviews.text: I previously had one of these and the micro USB charging is the entire point. The model I received (April 2109) has some dumb proprietary charger port. Absolute trash.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Poor Instruction Guide
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for creating this detailed video. I agree with you, that the Black & Decker Drill Instructions are not specific enough. This is the reason that I was led to find your video. This tutorial (YouTube :Davey Man) was much more helpful, than trying to depend on the poorly explained instructions. The guide booklet is not beginner friendly. I'm a woman. I work in the Beauty Industry. I was clueless about how to properly insert the drill bit. I appreciate your help.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: This couldn't drill through the most simple things. I tried multiple drill bits and several different materials. This hasn't successfully drilled through anything. I hate this drill
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: For a tiny, light weight drill, this actually does make me feel awesome when I am using it; It's strong and powerful for an 8v not that i would know though, im just getting started on building a basic essentials tool box for my lil ol self... beautiful design and rich colors and SUPER portable. 🧰
customer_reviews.author: Captain Onest

customer_reviews.title: Another cool purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my tiles and just about everything that it can be used for. Its light weight and perfect to use for smaller projects. I even used it clean my shoes - polish leather boots and silverware with using other attachments.... Many uses and decent battery life. I haven't had to charge it since I got it out of the box...... Great deal. Amazon supaaaah...😄👏 take a selfie with it sometimes and post it to your tik tok.
customer_reviews.author: ♥️ Mrs. Arb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill. I'm a middle aged woman and wanted it for tightening screws or putting something together....just to have in the house instead of using a screwdriver. It's very easy to use and I highly recommend it. Very safe also.
customer_reviews.author: Dani M

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like the drill, and it's very handy. HOWEVER, one big feature is missing, namely that it's charged by a standard micro-USB plug when in fact, the one I received comes with a proprietary connector, not a USB connector. And also, the screwdriver drill bit was not included in the box, although it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: cavalierdog

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with black n decker.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a drill for small projects, this is a great one. Battery will last about 30 minutes of spinning. Quite powerful for such a small drill. We only need to drill 1 or 2 holes here and there and spin some screws once in a while. I thought it said USB charge.. But it isn't. Maybe it was wishful thinking lol because usb is only 5 volts.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R Coates

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a drill at a local store to use to clean my showers with the brush I bought from amazon but my husband took it to work and I never saw it again. I bought this one figuring it would be cheap enough in quality he would leave it alone. Obviously my expectation wasn't that great but I'm pleasantly surprised. I've used it for the shower and other little projects around the house like putting together the assembly required furniture. Although I never tried I doubt you can use it for any really heavy jobs but it completely fit the bill for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Melhan

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but useful
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I expected and was worried it wouldn't have the strength to work well. It was used to replace a bracket on a couch and it worked beautifully. Excellent for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE- DESCRIPTION IS A LIE! Not USB
customer_reviews.text: The product description says: It offers an integrated battery with a micro USB charger that can also be used for charging other household items. IT DOES NOT! It comes with some power cord with a weird plug, NOT a USB. I purposely bought it to be charged by USB. I'm out of luck- But, if you didn't order yet, BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rooikat

customer_reviews.title: Great drill..
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this drill.. I wanted a smaller drill for smaller jobs. I have a full size Black and Decked cordless drill but it is often too big and powerful for the smaller jobs.. This drill is well made, surprisingly powerful and comfortable to holdand well balanced. I am tempted to buy s second drill as a back up in case B & D stops offering this drill. I have had two small B&D drills in the past and they lasted for years before the batteries pooped out. This one is even stronger and smaller than the past two drills. Love it..
customer_reviews.author: W. Torg

customer_reviews.title: It is very lightweight and worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cabinet from Amazon that required an 8 volt cordless drill. This drill worked great, and I needed a smaller light weight drill. I am an elderly woman and this will come in handy. I have a lot of Black and Decker small kitchen appliances that have held up great. This drill will be fine for small projects.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great little drill for small jobs.
customer_reviews.text: It should not be advertised as a drill unless it comes with a drill bit. Buy your bits separately. The size is great and it's easy to use. I just needed it for casual use around the house and so far it's done what I needed. If you need a heavy duty drill for something other than light work, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jo C

customer_reviews.title: Great for my purposes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill. I’m a single, 30 something year old mom, and this is my first drill. I have used it to hang curtains and wall decor. I find myself looking for other projects just so I can use it. It comes with one screw bit, and I ordered more with drill bits to use with it. They work well too!
customer_reviews.author: MommaLB

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact it has a chuck
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's decent. I like the fact it has a chuck, and charges from USB. It's Lacking: variable speed control. Motor uses mechanical brushes. When it goes, it will be a throwaway. It's hard to tighten the chuck enough to prevent slippage, but it can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT Micro USB Charger
customer_reviews.text: The charger was described as a micro USB charger. That’s why I bought this drill—even if something happened to its cord it would still be easy to charge. The actual charging cord on the product sent to me was NOT a micro USB.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Tirrell

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new place and was in need of a drill to hang things with. This drill does the job. It's small but powerful. It's simple to use and lightweight. It's smaller size makes it easy to maneuver in constricted spaces. Great drill and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Cats

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and compact.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very strong for it's size. I have build two wooden foot bridges, a shed ramp, and a 8' x 10' playhouse with this power drill/driver and self boring screws. The small size makes it so much easier to use in tight spaces. I use it for all screwing and drilling projects.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good LittleDrill
customer_reviews.text: So I own a heavy duty cordless that's big and heavy and can cause issues in small spaces or light work. Took a chance on this B&D small drill. Only used it few times but it's surprisingly good for the price and has more torque than you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT HOLD A CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: WILL NOT HOLD A CHARGE. Bought this item 9 months ago. Worked fine until I had to recharge it. Let it charge over night but drill will not charge. Very disappointed. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Good as a screwdriver/light drill...slow spin speed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tool for light work like screwing and drilling softer materials like drywall. It spins very slow for a drill making it useless for anything but light work. Does what I need it to but it's basically a cheap brushless motor hooked to a battery. If you're looking for anything with power look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JillyBilly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend what a life safer, compact, and strong.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with my clean power tool brushes. Oh my gosh! I love this thing. Not to big, power is exactly what I need. Charged all night and used it for over an hour to clean my shower. I’m buying another one for odd jobs around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Focus Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills its purpose perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We just needed a power drill to put a table together. This drill comes with a Phillips/flathead bit, and you don't even have to plug it in immediately; comes with a little juice. Overall a good drill for small projects.
customer_reviews.author: jib jose

customer_reviews.title: Drill ready
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and I’m presently surprised it’s light weight, has just enough power and is great for small tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Miko S.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's fine for some tasks but it's not powerful enough and there's no torque settings. I guess it depends on what you need it for. I liked it at first but I've decided I really need one with more power.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with brush attachments to scrub my shower. Genius! Powerful enough to get a good scrub. Charge lasts a long time. Perfect for light duty screws and top notch fir shower scrubbing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joby

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it was cheap , it came quickly which was great but the drill shown in picture has a keyless chuck already in it The drill I got DIDNT said I requested a replacement & once again got the same drill that didn’t come with one So unless you’re wanting to pay an extra $10 or so for a keyless chuck DO NOT GET THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Strong motor. This is a must to have for home owner or even renting an apartment. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It's good for what I wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: It's good for what I wanted it for, but it's definitely not powerful enough to use as a regular drill. It's kind of a cross between a drill and an electric screwdriver. I bought some scrubbing pads and use it mostly to clean, and also to use a screwdriver when I'm just too lazy to use my wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Horseshoe

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I use it at work and the first one lasted what seems like forever until it came up missing. It survived being dropped, left out in the rain, even coworkers spraying chemicals into it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Can you drill through concrete with it? No. Can it save your marriage because using this is way easier than trying to put together furniture by hand? Maybe, but counseling is important. Anyway, this small drill is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: but I just love it! It is sized just right for me ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to really use it much yet, but I just love it! It is sized just right for me and has everything I need for small jobs around the house. I would highly recommend it for all women who love to fix things around the house and do small projects.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for smaller  projects
customer_reviews.text: Now I will say this it is not super powerful but for my DIY projects it works great. It is small and has a rechargeable battery. definitely a great buy for smaller projects.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MISSING KEYLESS CHUCK
customer_reviews.text: I received a drill without a keyless chuck. Very disappointed, I can't even use it. I even charged it for the recommended 10 hours and bought special little drill bits for a specific project before I realized. Again very disappointed. I am now late on this commissioned project.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Pastard

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It sure comes in handy
customer_reviews.text: At the age of 60 I am now on my own due to a divorce and I need to start all over. I got tired of the screw driver and bought this little drill. I love it. It sure comes in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie Tailleur

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!! Wish everyone would SHOP HERE 1st!
customer_reviews.text: Have worked w/this Mfg for years! HOWEVER was SHOCKED @ pricing! SO MUCH BETTER As I just submitted item was returned as I rcvd SAME as a GIFT!! AMAZON TELLING TRUTH RE RETURN POLICY!!! WOW THEY ARE GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: linda nolan

customer_reviews.title: False advertising.
customer_reviews.text: Product not received as advertised. No drill bit included and not a USB port charger. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Projects
customer_reviews.text: The best, cheapest little drill that is perfect for every job around the house. Battery last quite a while. A little long to charge but its a cell phone battery so you know how that goes. Great torque (will twist the drill right out of my hands and I am a BIG guy).
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: IT'S THE PERFECT CORDLESS DRILL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CORDLESS DRILL! It is light weight & yet has power for all the basic home repair! The battery has been lasting great! Don't hesitate, this is a GOOD ONE!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for light drilling/screwing tasks
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up as I didn't need anything particularly powerful, and it's completely adequate to whatever tasks I throw at it. The USB charging is an interesting wrinkle, mind you.
customer_reviews.author: David Alexander McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Good drill
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to return this because it didn’t come in time for the project I needed it for, but I did see the drill and it looked very nice. Does NOT come with any bits, you must buy one
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small tasks
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing. My husband has his own tools for his shop but his electric drills are so bulky and dirty all the time. This is perfect for my personal set inside the house. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cakies

customer_reviews.title: I'M NOT SORRY.....
customer_reviews.text: ...... THAT I BOUGHT THIS DRILL!!! The battery lasts quite a bit Has enough power to get the job done right! I hung up so many shelves with the help of this drill..... I would buy this again if I had to for sure!
customer_reviews.author: JUSTCALLMEPHILLYB

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Drill missing the part that holds the bits. And no, it is not needing adjusting, nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Diana B.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and compact
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful! Definitely performs better than I expected at this price point. Exactly what I was looking for. Comes with one reversible bit (Philips/flathead). Charges quickly. The only downside is that the battery is not removable, so keep this drill out of children's view and reach. Well worth its cost. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ana'sFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, wireless, gets the job done for small projects at home but don’t expect to drill into metal or anything (Also buy your own bits).
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Atilano

customer_reviews.title: Small and good
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great for VERY small projects. Hanging a picture, drilling a hole through something small ect. But for my crafting things it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Nice little drill
customer_reviews.text: Nice little drill. Holds a charge. Good size. Forward/reverse switch convenient spot. Good power for lightweight drill. Bought it for her and she loves it but I look for it when some assembly projects are needed
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Compact and not that powerful but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it’s compact and does what it says. Cons: other than screwing some screws, or unscrewing some screws it’s not good for big projects. It doesn’t have the power. For that, buy one with a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Santana

customer_reviews.title: NOT MICRO USB.
customer_reviews.text: Mine did not come with a USB port. FALSE ADVERTISING. I waited for this thing for a week and it's not what I expected. It has some non-standard plug. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MITCH IGAN

customer_reviews.title: Great little drill
customer_reviews.text: Bought it just to mix up my wine must, but it didn't have enough speed to do the job so i thought it was useless until i tried to use it on my wifes BMW to take out some torqs screws, i wasnt very optimistic but wasnt trying to do the job by hand, so i thought i would try it out and sure enough the dumb little drill did a great job lol, kinda funny because its been sitting around doing nothing and i thought it was useless for the longest time but yeah great little drill!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m very new at buying tools. This tool has saved me so much time on little projects I do. The battery last forever. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dobrinski

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought this lightweight drill for basic projects and to NOT to scrip any threads like with my large corded one. Most of the complaints have been about the battery. Which only needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Adoni

customer_reviews.title: Small jobs
